sense.def:
To grip something
pomeni nekaj trdno držati.

seg.quote: I tightened my grip on the handrail.

sense.def:
A grip on someone or something
je obvladovanje nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: He now took a firm grip on the management side of the newspaper.
She felt herself in the grip of a sadness she could not understand.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
grips someone
, na tisto osebo nenadoma začne močno vplivati.

seg.quote: He seemed to be gripped by a powerful desire to laugh.

sense.def:
To be gripped by something
pomeni, da je naša pozornost osredotočena na nekaj.

seg.quote: I was really gripped by the first few pages.

sense.def:
To get to grips with a problem
ali
to come to grips with a problem
pomeni začeti ukrepati, da bi rešili neki problem.

seg.quote: It's taken us eighteen years to get to grips with our inadequacies.

sense.def:
To be losing one's grip
pomeni postajati manj sposoben za urejanje zadev.
